author: mariusvanderwijden
content:
>  it is an error for a given subcontainer to be referenced by both `RETURNCONTRACT` and `EOFCREATE`
Does this mean a subcontainer can only be referenced by one kind or only by one operation?
Is this one operation per code section or one operation overall?

author: _shemnon
content: It only matters if the container only reverts anyway.  That is the only legal way to have both kinds reference one container.

author: _shemnon
content: There is a test for this

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: So we need to store per subcontainer by which method is was called?

author: _shemnon
content: Only during validation.  But yes, which opcode calls the subcontainer.
